detail_desc: Imitation suede trainers with a stretchy, fully fashioned shaft. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy, and a gently rounded hem. The top is made partly from recycled polyester.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, a welt back pocket and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Padded ski jacket in windproof, water-repellent breathable functional fabric. Detachable, lined hood with an adjustable hook and loop tab at the back, and a zip down the front. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, a zipped inner pocket and zipped lift pass pocket on one sleeve. Long raglan sleeves with a hook and loop tab at the cuffs and jersey inner ribbing with thumbholes. Snow flap with press-studs and reinforced elastication at the waist. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Top in organic cotton jersey with narrow elastication around the neckline and short raglan sleeves.
Jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and elasticated cuffs. Jersey lining.
Dress in soft velour with a glittery pattern. Short butterfly sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.

Ankle-length trousers woven in a viscose blend with a high paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and wide, tapered legs.
Treggings in washed, stretch twill made from a soft cotton blend. Covered elastication at the waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets and glittery, silver-coloured side stripes.
Top in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and two flounced trims at the top, one in lace.
Short, fitted dress in a crisp cotton weave with a concealed zip at the back, billowing flounces over the shoulders and long sleeves. Unlined.
Jumper knitted in soft cashmere with a round neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Base layer set in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned sections. Top with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with ribbing at the waist and hems. The base layer is designed with the minimal number of seams for a more comfortable fit.
Hi-tops in imitation suede with an imitation leather heel cap and a zip at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles. Sole 3.5 cm.
Organic cotton jersey top with a wide neckline and 3/4-length sleeves.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, ties at the sides, overlocked frilled edges and a gathered seam at the back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a funnel collar and decorative drawstring, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short, V-neck dress in woven fabric with a unique nursing feature. Collar, a decorative button band at the top and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a pleat and a seam at the waist with ties at the front and elastication at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Treggings in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details. Elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket, jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Knee-length dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck, concealed zip at the back and short sleeves. Seam at the waist and an asymmetric skirt with decorative frills. Unlined.
Short, flared dress in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Elastication with a small frill trim at the top and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Seven thin metal hoop earrings with letter pendants. Diameter 3 cm.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and wide sides.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, narrow-wale cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud and front and back pockets.

Straight-cut shirt in cotton corduroy with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and an open chest pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable metal fastening at the back.
Fitted, round-necked T-shirt in ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Top in a sturdy weave with a crinkled finish, long sleeves with decorative gathers and an opening with a button at the back of the neck.
Bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved blouse in dobby-weave cotton with frill details, a small stand-up collar and V-neck with buttons at the front. Long sleeves with smocking and a narrow frill trim at the cuffs. Unlined.
Sleeveless playsuit in a viscose weave with elastication and a flounce at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist and discreet pockets in the side seams.

Long-sleeved shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and small embroidered detail on the chest. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short, fitted dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with short sleeves. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Jumper in a soft knit with a fluffy finish. Motif on the front, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, straight-style T-shirt in soft jersey with ribbing around the neckline and an embroidered motif at the top. The cotton content of the T-shirt is organic.
Ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Sandals in grained imitation leather with open toes, an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle and covered heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Short, sleeveless top in jersey that is slightly shorter at the front with a draped detail at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front. Jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sports vest top in ribbed fast-drying functional fabric made from recycled polyester with short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Rain jacket designed to fit a small dog with a collar, hole for a lead and a hook and loop fastening at the neck. Belt with reflective strips and a hook and loop fastening at the waist. Soft fleece inside.
Short dress in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Detachable, braided belt at the waist. Unlined.
Cotton chinos with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets with a button, and slim legs.
Skirt in glittery tulle with an elasticated waist and satin underskirt.
Sandals in imitation leather with scalloped, crossover foot straps and an ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a round neckline, open chest pocket with a small text print, and short slits in the sides.
Chino shorts in cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and detachable fabric belt. Zip fly and button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, voluminous dress in an airy, pattern-weave cotton blend with a crinkled effect. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide flounce layered over the top. Lined.
Fitted top in soft jersey with a lace yoke with frills and short cap sleeves.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Trousers in a softly draping silk and viscose weave with covered, gathered elastication and a narrow drawstring at the waist. Diagonal side pockets and straight, wide legs with pleats front and back.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
Fitted skirt in sturdy stretch jersey with an elasticated waist. Slightly shorter at the front. Unlined.
Short dress in patterned, stretch jersey crêpe. Round neckline with an opening at the back, short sleeves with overlocked edges, and gathers in the side seams for best fit over the tummy. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neck and straight-cut hem.
Bikini briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Pyjamas in soft cotton flannel. Long-sleeved shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front, an open chest pocket and buttoned cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, two buttons at the top and slits in the sides.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Key pocket in the waistband.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy, textured jersey with a lace band at the waist, concealed zip at the back and flared skirt with lace bands at the hem.

Shirt in a spotted cotton and viscose weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Biker shorts in sturdy microfibre with an elasticated waist and legs that finish just above the knee with elasticated hems. The shorts are made with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and a soft feel against the skin.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Set with a skirt and top in soft, organic cotton jersey. Patterned top with short puff sleeves, a round neckline with a narrow trim, and a press-stud on one shoulder. Skirt with an elasticated waist, flounced tiers and sewn-in pants with elasticated hems.
Briefs in ribbed jersey with a mid waist, wide elastic waistband, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Sock-style court shoes in imitation leather with a jersey top section, pointed toes and covered heels. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 6 cm.

All-in-one suit in soft velour with a kangaroo pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems. Press-studs on one shoulder, at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1½-4Y). The cotton content of the all-in-one suit is organic.
Wide, sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck with a pleat centre front. Rounded hem, longer at the back.
Suede trainers with elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Top in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long, slightly wider sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wide, straight-cut dress in cotton jersey with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a seam and wide flounce at the hem.
Rib-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
